enchantment.enchantmentplus.amplified_sh: Increases arrow damage by consuming additional arrows.
enchantment.enchantmentplus.beheading.de: Grants a chance to behead the victim on kill, making them drop their head. Only works on vanilla heads.
enchantment.enchantmentplus.cleansing.de: Grants a chance to clear all negative effects on the user after hitting an entity.
enchantment.enchantmentplus.combustion.d: Increases damage against entities that are on fire.
Ores in the inventory will be compressed into their block form when the user hits the matching ore.
enchantment.enchantmentplus.decaying.des: Grants a chance to inflict wither to the victim for 5 seconds.
enchantment.enchantmentplus.deflect.desc: Completely negates one instance of incoming damage with a cooldown. Additional levels decreases the cooldown.
enchantment.enchantmentplus.devouring.de: Grants a chance to consume the remainings of the victim on death, feeding the user.
enchantment.enchantmentplus.divine_hunte: Converts spectral arrows into beams of light that can penetrate through objects and deal damage.
enchantment.enchantmentplus.enraged.desc: Grants +30% attack damage and -20% armor reduction per level.
enchantment.enchantmentplus.eternity.des: Prevents all types of arrows from being consumed.
enchantment.enchantmentplus.exploding_im: Thrown tridents create a non-block breaking explosion upon hitting a block or an entity.
enchantment.enchantmentplus.feeding_modu: Automatically feeds the user with the food in the inventory.
enchantment.enchantmentplus.flight_exten: Grants a chance to retrieve a firework rocket back when used while flying.
enchantment.enchantmentplus.icy.desc: Grants a chance to slow down the victim by 60% for 5 seconds.
enchantment.enchantmentplus.indestructib: The item no longer takes durability damage.
Converts lava below user's feet into basalt permanently.
Grants +15% attack speed and -15% attack damage per level.
enchantment.enchantmentplus.prosperous.d: Killed mobs have a chance to drop emeralds on death.
enchantment.enchantmentplus.radiance_gus: Trident deals area of effect damage continuously while in charging stance.
enchantment.enchantmentplus.shock_dampen: Completely negates damage from kinetic energy, falling stalactites, anvils and blocks.
enchantment.enchantmentplus.soul_exchang: Every 6 seconds, the user's life is drained to grant a soul stack.
enchantment.enchantmentplus.soul_rend.de: Attacking drains life from the user to grant a soul stack. At 5 stacks, souls are channeled into the next attack, multiplying the damage.
enchantment.enchantmentplus.swirling.des: Grants a chance to cause a swirling attack on hit, damaging all targets 5 blocks around the victim.
enchantment.enchantmentplus.thermal_plat: Grants fire resistance when all 4 armor pieces are enchanted.
enchantment.enchantmentplus.torment.desc: Increases damage against Nether based mobs.
enchantment.enchantmentplus.vampiric_bit: Grants a chance to leech life from the victim on hit.
enchantment.enchantmentplus.venomous.des: Grants a chance to inflict poison to the victim for 5 seconds.
enchantment.enchantmentplus.voidfused.de: Increases damage against End based mobs.
enchantment.enchantmentplus.weakening.de: Grants a chance to weaken the victim for 5 seconds.
death.attack.life_drain.player: %1$s's life was completely drained while fighting %2$s
death.attack.light_beam: %1$s was pierced by %2$s with a beam of light
death.attack.light_beam.item: %1$s was pierced by %2$s with a beam of light using %3$s
death.attack.light_beam.player: %1$s was pierced by %2$s with a beam of light while fighting %3$s
desc.enchantmentplus.datapack_descriptio:
§7• Adds more enchantments to improve gameplay experience.

§D• Have fun enchanting!
desc.enchantmentplus.masterwork_notifica: You got lucky while enchanting and obtained a special enchanted book!
desc.simple_paxels.datapack_description:
§7• Adds paxels that can mine all types of blocks.

§B• Have fun mining!
